## Source: ossf-package-analysis (c0928a2f92beacda32023ac378b5df81feeffd91699903ea3500b46a6fcdefb9)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'datadog-checks-base' @ 50.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
